panels.title: Welcome to Interlake Scioly!
panels.text: We compete in science and engineering events at the local, regional, state, and national levels! We compete in science and engineering events at the local, regional, state, and national levels. See soinc.org and scioly.org for more information. We meet on Mondays from 3:30-4:00 in room 1708. Come join us :)

panels.title: Event Category: Life, Personal & Social Science
panels.text: Anatomy and Physiology, Designer Genes, Disease Detectives, Ornithology, Water Quality

panels.title: Event Category: Earth and Space Science
panels.text: Astronomy, Dynamic Planet, Fossils, GeoLogic Mapping

panels.title: Event Category: Physical Science & Chemistry
panels.text: Chem Lab, Circuit Lab, Forensics, Thermodynamics, Protein Modeling, Sounds of Music

panels.title: Inquiry & Nature of Science
panels.text: Codebusters, Experimental Design, Fermi Questions, Write It Do It
